comments.body: I think we need to move this test case from arithmetic cases to math test cases.
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -154,7 +154,7 @@ class ArithmeticExpressionSuite extends SparkFunSuite with ExpressionEvalHelper
     }
 
     checkEvaluation(Sqrt(Literal.create(null, DoubleType)), null, create_row(null))
-    checkEvaluation(Sqrt(-1), null, EmptyRow)
+    checkEvaluation(Sqrt(-1.0), null, EmptyRow)

comments.body: math test cases already have similar tests. If we don't need it here, we can remove it from arithmetic cases.
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -154,7 +154,7 @@ class ArithmeticExpressionSuite extends SparkFunSuite with ExpressionEvalHelper
     }
 
     checkEvaluation(Sqrt(Literal.create(null, DoubleType)), null, create_row(null))
-    checkEvaluation(Sqrt(-1), null, EmptyRow)
+    checkEvaluation(Sqrt(-1.0), null, EmptyRow)
